extendedInfo.description: Browse the PFRPG Reference Document completely offline, with a five-level index with 16.100 choices, for a very fast consulting.PFRPG stands for PF Role Playing Game, the fantasy RPG by Paizo Publishing.The contents of the Reference Document are updated to 1 July 2013.There are also other feature:â¢ Multi-tab browsingâ¢ Search System, with the ability to search for any word in the index.â¢ It is also possible to search trough "Quick search box" widgetâ¢ Search in pageâ¢ Bookmarksâ¢ Support for large screen/honeycomb/Ice Cream Sandwich/tabletâ¢ Five-level index, with over 16.100 choicesâ¢ Completely offline browsing--------------------------------------------------------------------|||||Important Notice||||||||||||For technical problems, I can not grant automatic updates directly from Google Play.If you wish to have the latest updates(01/07/2013), you can install them via this link: http://www.dragora.net/apk/PFSRD.apkWARNING: you must manually uninstall the old application to install the updates.I also set up a mailing list to keep you updated on any releases: http://dragora.net/mailman/listinfo/pf_rpg_dragora.net--------------------------------------------------------------------MAIN INDEX************** Core Rulebook *******************(0) Getting Started(1) Races(2) Classes(3) Using Skills(4) Skill Descriptions(5) Feats(6) Equipment(7) Additional Rules(8) Combat(9) Magic(10) Spell Lists(11) Spell Index(12) Prestige Classes(13) Gamemastering(14) Environment(15) NPC Classes(16) Creating NPCs(17) Magic Items(18) Glossary************** Advanced Guide *******************(19) Races(20) Base Classes(21) Core Classes(22) Prestige Classes(23) Feats(24) Gear(25) Spell Lists(26) Spell Index(27) Magic Items(28) New Rules************** Advanced Race Guide *******************(29) Core Races(30) Featured Races(31) Uncommon Races(32) Race Builder(33) Age, Height & Weight(34) Spell Lists************** Ultimate Combat *******************(35) Gunslinger(36) Ninja(37) Samurai(38) Class Archetypes(39) Feats(40) Mastering Combat(41) Vehicles(42) Variant Rules(43) Spell Index(44) Spell Lists************** Ultimate Magic *******************(45) Magus(46) Spellcasting Class Options(47) Mastering Magic(48) Feats(49) Words of Power(50) Spells(51) Spell Lists(52) Updates************** Ultimate Equipment *******************(53) Arms and Armor(54) Gear(55) Magic Arms and Armor(56) Rings, Rods, and Staves(57) Wondrous Items(58) Artifacts and Other Items(59) Appendix************** Game Mastery *******************(60) Planar Adventures(61) Settlements(62) Fast Play Ship Combat(63) Chases(64) Disasters(65) Drugs and Addiction(66) Haunts(67) Hazards(68) Sanity and Madness(69) NPC Boons(70) NPC Gallery************** Ultimate Campaign *************(71) Character Background(72) Downtime(73) Campaign Systems(74) Kingdoms and War************** NPC Codex *******************(75) Core Classes(76) Prestige Classes(77) NPC Classes(78) Iconic Characters(79) Appendix************** Bestiary 1, 2 and 3 *******************(80) Monster Introduction(81) Bestiary Monster Index(82) Bestiary 2 Monster Index(83) Bestiary 3 Monster Index(84) Variant Monster Index(85) Monster Cohorts(86) Animal Companions(87) Monsters as PCs(88) Monster Roles(89) Bestiary Encounter Tables(90) Monster Creation(91) Monster Advancement(92) Universal Monster Rules(93) Creature Types(94) Monster Feats(95) Bestiary Monsters by Type(96) Bestiary Monsters by CR(97) Bestiary Monsters by Terrain************** Index *******************(98) Feats Index(99) Magic Item Index(100) Spell Index(101) Spell List IndexChangelog 1.3.7â¢Reference Update (Ultimate Campaign)Tags: rpg,d20,prd,pfrpg,pf,advanced,ogl,ogc,pfsrd, path finder, magic ultimate, combat ultimate, campaign, dungeons, dragons, dnd

reviews.title: A must have for GMs and players!
reviews.comment: I GM quite a lot and this app is indispensable for quickly looking up anything from the Core books.  My only wish, and I\'m not even docking stars for it, is that Ultimate Equipment would be included.  But the usefulness of this app outweighs missing missing a single book.
reviews.author: matt benjamin

reviews.title: It\'s a must have :)
reviews.comment: This app is a role players must have at the play table. Easy to use quick referance and speeds up play. It\'s makes the game masters work much easier.
reviews.author: \303\223lafur Magn\303\272s Sveinsson

reviews.title: 3 stars untill update
reviews.comment: Edit: after a quick response from the creator I found you can get the update but not from the google play store.  5 stars still the best pathfinder srd app
reviews.author: Steve Sims

reviews.title: great but could use an update
reviews.comment: this app is great nut could you possible try to updateing with some of the new books like advanced race guild if you could that would be amazing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but missing content
reviews.comment: This app is incredibly useful, but doesn\'t have all of the content it claims. Adv. Races Guide and Ultimate Equipment don\'t show on the droid version, but do in the Apple versions.  4/5 for use and functionality which helps mitigate some of the missing content.  The droid version won\'t update past 1.3.0.
reviews.author: Tim B

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: The free version does the job but this app is so good I bought the paid version to suport the developer. Thank you.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My most useful tool
reviews.comment: This is a near perfect app. I can\'t tell you how often I use it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very useful.
reviews.comment: Super great!  Thanks for the update instructions.
reviews.author: Rebekah Guthrie

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: this has made playing and DMing so much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great reference app
reviews.comment: Everything works well, no pictures but thats not really required. With updates were were quicker.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Everything you need
reviews.comment: Great ui and support, I don\'t even carry my books anymore unless I need one that hasn\'t been added. Keep chipping away at that list and I\'ll stay 5 star happy. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, the search function is right on and all of the content is there. Only complaint is thebattery drain that it causes, other than that it\'s perfect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great database
reviews.comment: Well organized and easy to use and search for anything in the books. Needs some typo fixes though
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!!!
reviews.comment: New to Pathfinder/D&D and I absolutely love this application...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good, few bugs
reviews.comment: I like this app very much. There are only a few bugs. Sometimes the tabs are not shown properly when there are many. I would like to see the app in the dark hollow design, too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: See above. The UI is a bit unituitive at the top with my kindle, but not my SIII.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Great app, very useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: the best pathfinder app :D
reviews.comment: Super complete and well organized. Easy to find almost everything you need for rpg
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: PFRPG a neccesity
reviews.comment: If you play pathfinder this is the only app to even think about
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful app
reviews.comment: Replaced my books at the table. Search works well too.
reviews.author: A Google User
